item.description:
This is our regular monthly meeting.

Okay, group! We are going to try something a little different in January. The Wood-n-Tap has been a good meeting spot, but the group discussed trying something new for the next meeting.

This time we will be meeting at P. F. Chang's in West Hartford at Westfarms mall.

I assume that everyone knows how to get to Westfarms mall, but might not know where P.F. Chang's is located from within the mall. I will have my blackberry if you run into any trouble and you can contact me at 860.416.4444 or call the restaurant directly before you arrive.

There are already a good number of RSVP's for the next meeting so I am going to call ahead of time to make sure that we have some space available.

I am looking forward to seeing you all there.

Any questions contact me: my email is dmassicotte@premierexpress.net

group.name: The Hartford Russian Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Hartford Russian Language January Meetup
